name: Crate Digger
description:
You are a dope DJ!

You are in need of records, so you hit the shops in search of the fire!!!

Test your skills of selecting and musical knowledge to choose the correct records that will be your arsenal in a final battle against a fierce DJ Opponent.

FRRREEEESSSSSSHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH

created and illustrated by : Aaron M27 Ruiz

https://www.aaronm27ruiz.com/
